data.question: Where do I submit my tax file ?
data.answer:
Dears you might receive a brown cover post stating tax file for you that you can submit via online or filled hard copy in IT office in Brussels,
Address Boulevard du Jardin Botanique 50, 1000 Bruxelles (Inside botanique metro)
